Creamos las mejores prendas hechas de ma: Each Rewear box fights pollution using 364 plastic bottles recovered from rivers and oceans.
Cada color genera un impacto positivo co: Each color generates a positive impact on the enviroment, because our process saves 793 gallons of water and doesn’t use chemicals or dyes.
Cambia al mundo con cada camiseta. Arma: Change the world with every t-shirt. Set up your boxes.

Puedes armar tus cajas escogiendo fit de: You can set up your box choosing among women's fit and men/unisex fit and mix it.

Cada caja de camisetas rewear elimina la: We created 6 basic colors for your clothing brand, to distribute or to be part of your<br class='d-none d-sm-none d-md-block d-lg-block'> organization. Our main feature is that we don’t dye our clothes, we achieve them<br class='d-none d-sm-none d-md-block d-lg-block'> by mixing recycled cotton fibers to get the perfect color in our t-shirts.

Nuestra calidad la respaldamos <br class: We pack up our quality with the best certifications
¿Qué tipo de estampado se recomienda par: What kind of print is recommended for Rewear T-shirt?
La serigrafía, el bordado y el vinil tex: The screen print, embroidery and textile vinyle are the principal techniques to print and make some designs in our Rewear t-shirt. This is because our sustainable  50% recycled cotton and 50% recycled polyester, there’s some others techniques like transfer, sublimation, DTG impression, etc.
¿Cómo ordeno las tallas en mi caja de 72: ¿How can i order the sizes per box?
Elige tus tallas desde la S hasta la XL: Choose your sizes from S to XL for woman; and from S to 2XL for man. Sizes must been ordered from groups of 6, for example 6, 12, 18 pieces to complete your 72 tshirt box.
¿Cuántos colores puedo elegir por caja?: How many colors can i choose per box?
Dependiendo del plan que elijas puedes e: Depending the plan you choose you can select between 2 to 6 colors. For the start plan (1 box of 72pz) you can choose between 2 colors, sizes since S to XL and the 2 fits: women and man. For the plus plan (2 to 3 boxes – 144 to 216 pz) you can select between 4 colors, sizes from S to XL and the 2 fits. For the top plan (4 boxes or more) you can choose between 6 colors, sizes from S to XL and the 2 fits.
¿Qué diferencias existen entre el fit de: What are the differences between womens fit and men fit?
Aunque ambas manejan un corte regular co: Altough both have a regular cut with circle neck, the womens fit has the sleeve shorter and waisted. The mens fit is more like a unisex style, with a wider sleeve and a straight cut. You can check te exact measurements in inches with all the part of the Rewear t-shirt in our digital catalogue.
¿Qué es el algodón reciclado y por qué e: What’s the recycled cotton and why is this important?
El algodón reciclado utilizado en las pl: The recycled cotton used in Rewear t-shirts is pre-consumer and comes from textile waste coming from the cutting tables in garments from other textile industries in Mexico and USA. This textile waste pre-consumer have some industrial process to get into his original composition and be reused in our high quality t-shirt. Using recycled cotton we promote the zero waste movement and a circular economy in textile industry.
¿Cómo se utilizan las botellas de plásti: How’s recycled pet bottles used in Rewear t-shirts?
Para la creación del hilo con el que se: For the thread creation used in the cloth of the Rewear t-shirts we use cotton and polyester recycled fibers. We have a supplier with Global Recycled Standard who guarantees traceability and sustainability of the polyester fibers used, same we obtain from the transformation of RPET plastic bottles recovered from China specialized recyclers.
¿Por qué el blanco tiene un tono azulado: Why does white have a bluish cast?
El tono azulado en nuestras camisetas bl: The bluish cast in our White t-shirts is because the nature of the same composition 50% Recycled cotton and 50% Recycled polyester, due to the polyester fiber acquires that tone after his transformation and recycle process.
Las certificaciones que nos brinda nuest: The certifications our supplier give us is important because with that we guarantee that each shirt has gone through a sustainable process, recycled cotton and using only .52 gallons of water since his creation to his conffection, without dye, use chemicals or hurting the enviroment. This certifications are: Global Recycled Standard and Higg Index issued by Sustainable Apparel Coalition, In addition, our provider is a member of Textile Exchange and Aware. For more info about these certifications, please Get in touch with one of our advisors and we will gladly clarify all your doubts.
¿Cuál es el tiempo de vida de una prenda: What is the life time of a Rewear t-shirt?
Nuestras prendas están creadas para gara: Our garments are created to guarantee a long-life time: approximately 60 to 90 washes without losing their shape and quality with the suggested care and recommendations. We started this in order for your Rewear garments to generate a greater impact and added value for your brand and to fight together against fast fashion that generates disposable and poor-quality garments.
¿Qué diferencia hay entre el algodón org: What’s the difference between organic cotton and recycled cotton?
El algodón orgánico es una alternativa q: The organic cotton is an alternative that proposes the cotton cultivation without the chemicals or pesticides to raise the production. Otherwise the recycled cotton doesn’t propose cultivate more and continue using water and damaging the ground, it reuses the pre-consumer cotton that exists and returning to his original composition ands creates hig quality textile. In Rewear we reuse, we doesn’t creates new cotton.
¿Puedo crear mi marca de ropa desde cero: Can I create my clothing brand from zero directly with Rewear?
¡Claro! Nuestros planes están adecuados: Sure! Our plans are specialized so you can choose between colors, fits and sizes to set up your Brand and help to change the fashion industry with sustainable clothes. If you want to know more options that we can offer you to develop your Brand, please contact one of our advisors and we will gladly help you.
¿Qué beneficios le trae a mi marca utili: What benefits does using Rewear clothes bring to my brand?
Cuidar al planeta está de moda y hoy más: Taking care for the planet is important and today more than ever, it’s not a trend, it’s a necessity. Using sustainable clothes makes your brand join the group of conscious companies that want to make a favorable change for the planet, generates greater added value to your designs and transmits the message of care to new generations. We build the future of fashion every day with brands that adds to sustainability.
¿Con qué etiquetas viene la playera Rewe: What labels does the Rewear T-shirt come with?
Nuestras camisetas Rewear vienen sin nin: Our Rewear t-shirts come without any visible distinctive of our brand, this made for you can easily place logos, labels and designs of your own brand. For product description and export purposes, Rewear t-shirts only have two internal labels that are not visible on the left side: one with our name and another that mentions washing care and composition. Both labels can be easily removed for the use you want to give to the t-shirts.
Actualmente contamos con un estilo de pl: Nowadays we have 1 t-shirt style, with a regular cut whit composition 50% recycled cotton and 50% recycled polyester, but sooner we Will introduce new models and new compositions organics and sustainable so that your brand stands out from all the others.
Gracias a su composición de algodón y po: Thanks to its composition of recycled cotton and polyester, we achieve a minimum shrinkage of the garments, 5% more and 5% less than the original measurements. Work with sustainable fibers represents a great challenge because it requires a lot of experimentation and processes to achieve the perfection of the garment that you will soon have in your hands.
¿Cuánto tardan en llegar mis playeras Re: How long does it take for my Rewear t-shirts to arrive?
De 8 a 15 días aproximadamente a través: It takes from 8 to 15 days approximately through parcel. We are proud to be able to reach all of Mexico and the United States. We only need a few data to complete your order and very soon you will have your boxes of shirts at the address you specify. We look forward to working with you.
* Debes seleccionar un color y talla par: * To purchase, size and color must be selected
